title: Their Love Stories - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted from Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Popular Love Interests   R*pe   Shy Characters
author: 云起莫离
description: Mo Suqing woke up one morning to find a stranger on the bed beside her and decided to accept the handsome guy’s offer of marriage on the spot. What seemed to be a rash decision to get over with her ex turned out to be the love of her life. However, dark secrets began to come to light one by one as she learned more about the man. Will they be able to get through all the obstacles presented in their way? Meanwhile, the other characters were also writing their own love stories…>
